title: Best Bits with Morgan & Special Guest Scuba Steve
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan & Special Guest Scuba Steve
description:
Morgan and Scuba Steve talk about their holiday vacations including his crazy situation to get back to Nashville. Plus the two have yet another therapy session talking about 2022 and what they hope to do. That’s not all, they also take a walk down memory lane and remember all of the things from years ago that they hope make a comeback.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
